ActionDTO Data Type

Holds information about an action.

Properties
name data type description
object_type ObjectHandle The type of object to which this action applies (e.g. incident, task, etc.). See actionsFrameworkInfoDTO (action_object_types property) for the list of possible values.
conditions array of ConditionDTO The conditions that trigger this action. For manual actions, these conditions control when the user will see the action in the UI. For automatic actions, these conditions control when the action gets automatically fired.
message_destinations array of object The list of message destination IDs for this action. See MessageDestinationREST.
workflows array of object The list of workflow IDs for this action.
timeout_seconds number The maximum amount of time in seconds that can elapse before this action has been considered to be timed out. A value of null indicates that the action should use the default timeout (currently 1 day).
uuid string A unique identifier for this Custom Action.
export_key string This value is used for export/import to uniquely represent this field
logic_type string A list of logic types to apply to the conditions. The following are examples:
  • all
  • any
  • advanced
automations array of AutomationDefinitionDTO The automations run when the conditions for this action are met. They are run in the order of the list.
custom_condition string The custom evaluation string to be used with logic_type = advanced. Ex: "(1 AND 2) OR 3" This field must be passed when logic_type advanced is used, and will be ignored and deleted for both other logic types.
Properties inherited from PartialActionDTO
number The ID of the action.
string The display name of the action.
number The type of the action (e.g. manual or automatic). See actionsFrameworkInfoDTO (action_types property) for the list of possible values.

Example

{
  "object_type" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "conditions" : [ {
    "method" : "...",
    "field_name" : "...",
    "value" : { },
    "type" : "...",
    "evaluation_id" : 12345
  }, {
    "method" : "...",
    "field_name" : "...",
    "value" : { },
    "type" : "...",
    "evaluation_id" : 12345
  } ],
  "message_destinations" : [ { }, { } ],
  "workflows" : [ { }, { } ],
  "timeout_seconds" : 12345,
  "uuid" : "...",
  "export_key" : "...",
  "logic_type" : "...",
  "automations" : [ {
    "type" : "run_script",
    "type_id" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "field" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "operation" : "set_field",
    "tasks_to_create" : [ {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    }, {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    } ],
    "scripts_to_run" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "value" : { }
  }, {
    "type" : "modify_field",
    "type_id" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "field" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "operation" : "set_field",
    "tasks_to_create" : [ {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    }, {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    } ],
    "scripts_to_run" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "value" : { }
  } ],
  "custom_condition" : "...",
  "id" : 12345,
  "name" : "...",
  "type" : 12345
}
